select
from huodongbaoming where baomingren = #{baomingren,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1

select count(*) from huodongbaoming where 1=1 and yonghuming like concat('%',#{yonghuming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingming like concat('%',#{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shetuanmingcheng like concat('%',#{shetuanmingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shetuanleixing like concat('%',#{shetuanleixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and huodongzhuti like concat('%',#{huodongzhuti,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and huodongdidian like concat('%',#{huodongdidian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and huodongshijian like concat('%',#{huodongshijian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and baomingren like concat('%',#{baomingren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and baomingliyou like concat('%',#{baomingliyou,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and issh like concat('%',#{issh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select from huodongbaoming where 1=1
and baomingren =#{baomingren}

select from huodongbaoming where 1=1 and yonghuming like concat('%',#{yonghuming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingming like concat('%',#{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shetuanmingcheng like concat('%',#{shetuanmingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shetuanleixing like concat('%',#{shetuanleixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and huodongzhuti like concat('%',#{huodongzhuti,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and huodongdidian like concat('%',#{huodongdidian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and huodongshijian like concat('%',#{huodongshijian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and baomingren like concat('%',#{baomingren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and baomingliyou like concat('%',#{baomingliyou,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and issh like concat('%',#{issh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by id desc
limit #{pageno},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into huodongbaoming
id,
yonghuming, xingming, shetuanmingcheng, shetuanleixing, huodongzhuti, huodongdidian, huodongshijian, baomingren, baomingliyou,
addtime,

update huodongbaoming
yonghuming = #{yonghuming,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xingming = #{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shetuanmingcheng = #{shetuanmingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shetuanleixing = #{shetuanleixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, huodongzhuti = #{huodongzhuti,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, huodongdidian = #{huodongdidian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, huodongshijian = #{huodongshijian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baomingren = #{baomingren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baomingliyou = #{baomingliyou,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
